    • initialize

      public void initialize​(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      The method used to initialize the stage. The controls are disabled by default
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the playerBoard to show

    • rollback

      public void rollback()
      The method called when the rollback button is pressed. It executes the set rollbackAction and tell the clientcontroller to rollback.

    • populateUserSelect

      public void populateUserSelect()
      Populate the user ChoiceBox with the list of players

    • leaderCardClicked

      private void leaderCardClicked​(int cardIndex)
      The method to call when a leader card is clicked. It shows a dialog that let the user play or discard the card
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - the index of the choosen card in the player's cards list

    • disableControls

      public void disableControls()
      Disable all the buttons so that the user cannot click them

    • enableControls

      public void enableControls()
      Enable the default buttons so that the user can click them

    • goToMarket

      public void goToMarket()
      Method called when the market button is pressed. It tells the client sceneController to open the market

    • startProduction

      public void startProduction()
      Method called when the production button is pressed. If the user has not choose the producers, it enables the listener to let him choose them. Otherwise, it sends the producer list to the clientController to start the production

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard()
      Method called when the buy development card button is pressed. It tells the client sceneController to open the development cards list

    • showWarehouse

      public void showWarehouse​(Warehouse warehouse)
      Update the warehouse on the playerboard
      Parameters:
      warehouse - the new warehouse to show

    • warehouseSelected

      private void warehouseSelected​(int rowIndex, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Method to call when a warehouse row is clicked. It runs the action specified by parameter
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the index of the warehouse's row
      action - the action to be executed

    • enableWarehouseSelection

      private void enableWarehouseSelection​(java.lang.Runnable onDepotSelectedAction)

      Parameters:

      Enables controls used to choose producers and to start the production
      Parameters:
      availableProductions - the productions that can be started
      chooser - the action to be executed when a producer is selected

      developmentCard - the development card to be placed

    • performedAction

      public void performedAction()
      This method is called at the end of the turn to bring back the controls to the default status
